text: Mary Ann Jackson (January 14, 1923-December 17, 2003) was an American actress in the 1920s. She was a child actor during the silent movie era at the age of Two. She is also known for being a member of the Our Gang in the Little Rascals movie franchise. Category:1923 births Category:2003 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American silent movie actors
title: Mary Ann Jackson
